pageProduct.name: Avene Physiolift Eye Contour 15ml
pageProduct.description:
General Information

Eye contour cream for all skin type presenting wrinkles, puffiness and dark circles.

Warnings

Formulated to minimize the risks of allergy. Non comedogenic. For external use only. Avoid contact with the eyes. Do not used when pregnant.

Common Uses

Smoothing night eye contour cream which fills the wrinkles, smoothes and tightens the skin around the eyes, reduces puffiness and even the most persistent dark circles. Its balm texture allows an effective hydration and prevent the product to migrate too far into the eyes. Fragrance-free, alcohol-free, paraben-free.

Ingredients

AVENE THERMAL SPRING WATER (AVENE AQUA). ALUMINUM STARCH OCTENYLSUCCINATE. GLYCERIN. ISODECYL NEOPENTANOATE. PPG-15 STEARYL ETHER. CETYL ALCOHOL. CETEARYL ALCOHOL. GLYCERYL STEARATE. PEG-100 STEARATE. CAPRYLIC/CAPRIC TRIGLYCERIDE. DIMETHICONE. 1,2-HEXANEDIOL. ASCOPHYLLUM NODOSUM EXTRACT. BHT. CAPRYLYL GLYCOL. CETEARETH-33. DISODIUM EDTA. RED 33 (CI 17200). RETINAL. SODIUM DEXTRAN SULFATE. SODIUM HYALURONATE. SODIUM HYDROXIDE. TOCOPHERYL ACETATE. WATER (AQUA). XANTHAN GUM.

Directions

Apply in the evening by gently dabbing along the orbital bones and the eye sockets, focusing on crow's feet; after cleansing, a fine mist of Avène Thermal Spring Water, applying Physiolift serum and Physiolift smoothing regenerating night balm.
